page.title: 12EVERCREECH CRICKET CLUB
page.content:
Their greatest achievement since 1970 was in 1984 ; when they won promotion into the Premier Division of the Somerset{League.}The best overall year,however was probably 1978,when they were promoted from the 3rd division into the 2nd. The club has experienced some difficulties sharing the ground with the village football team.A separate pavilion was built in 1973,replacing an older building which had burnt down.Ironically{Nigel Cowley {now a}regular for {Hampshire C.C.C. {took all}ten Evercreech wickets on the day the old pavilion burned down.
THE PLAYING FIELD The playing field is three acres.There are pavilions for Cricket and Football.There are childrens swings and slide and roundabout.
